data.name: GG-Party
data.detailed_description:
GG-Party is a party-game for up to 8 player. Grab your friends, choose your favourite colour, and get ready to defend it with all your power!

The Game consists of multiple Minigames, which you can experience in one of two gamemodes.
Minigame-Mode: Pick your favourite minigames, and challenge your friends directly!
Tournament-Mode: A gauntlet of many minigames, in which the player who collects the most money suitcase is crowned the winner!

In addition to new takes on minigame ideas, the game also contains a few retro inspired minigames, though of course those too received a fresh coat of paint, to ensure both familiarity and a new and enjoyable experience. That coat of paint might cover rules, design or even the * type / genre *. Nostalgia and new experiences, mixed into a beautiful new hue.

So go ahead gather your friends and go 4 it!
Let the colors clash!

Current Minigames:
  • Paintball (Shoot your friends from first person. Can you be the first to get 15 kills?)
  • TacticBombs (Blow up your friends, or at least blow up while trying.)
  • Run (Who will be the fastest? Find out in this third person race!)
  • RCMonstertrucks (Who will be the best remote control monster trucker?)
  • TPShooter (Blow up big scorpions)



The future of GG-Party
This awaits you in the summer of 2023 in the official release:
The GG-Party-Mode: A new gamemode with a main Game intermissioned by our colorful Minigames.
In the Maingame you get a chance to spent the money you earned in minigames. Be it to bribe a bouncer or collect protection money from a pizza place, or something entirely different...

data.short_description: GG-Party is a party-game for up to 8 player. Grab your friends, choose your favourite colour, and get ready to defend it with all your power!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7700 or Ryzen 2600
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon VII
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i9700 or Ryzen 3700
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or AMD RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: i5 or M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: i7 or M1 Pro
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD-Radeon-5000-Serie
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
